params.data: An array of bytes used by the strategy contract.
params.poolId: Id of the pool to allocate liquidity into.

returns.deltaL: Amount of liquidity received by the allocator.
returns.deltaX: Amount of token X allocated into the pool.
returns.deltaY: Amount of token Y allocated into the pool.

params.data: An array of bytes used by the strategy contract.
params.poolId: Id of the pool to deallocate liquidity from.

returns.deltaX: Amount of token X deallocated from the pool.
returns.deltaY: Amount of token Y deallocated from the pool.

params.params: A struct containing the initialization parameters.

returns.poolId: Id of the newly initialized pool.
returns.reserveX: Initial amount of token X in the pool.
returns.reserveY: Initial amount of token Y in the pool.
returns.totalLiquidity: Initial amount of liquidity in the pool.

params.data: An array of bytes used by the strategy contract.
params.poolId: Id of the pool to swap tokens into.

returns.inputAmount: Amount of tokens sent to the DFMM contract.
returns.outputAmount: Amount of tokens received by the swapper.

params.data: An array of bytes used by the strategy contract.
params.poolId: Id of the pool to update.

lpTokenImplementation().notice: Address of the implementation of the LPToken contract.

update(uint256,bytes).notice: Updates pool `poolId` by calling the associated strategy.

documentation.text: @dev Thrown when the invariant is invalid.
@dev Thrown when pool tokens are identical.
@dev Thrown when a new call is made during a locked state.
@dev Thrown when the reserves are invalid after a swap.
@dev Thrown when the transfer of the input amount is invalid.
@dev Thrown when the transfer of the output amount is invalid.
@dev Thrown when a clone contract could not be deployed.
@notice Address of the implementation of the LPToken contract.
